original: @69b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @69b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri mu kha sha ta tsakra s'adha n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri mu kha sha ta tsakra s'adha n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamārimukhaṣaṭcakrasādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Accomplishing the Wheel of Black Yamāri with Six Faces

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bla ma bcom ldan mi bskyod la //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo // bla ma bcom ldan mi bskyod la //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Vajradhara.

original: gus pa yis ni btud byas te //
analyzed: gus pa yis ni btud byas te //
translated: With devotion I bow to the guru, the Blessed Akṣobhya,

original: thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: And in order to attain liberation,

original: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
analyzed: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
translated: I will write his means of accomplishment.

original: de la dang por sgrub pa ni //
analyzed: de la dang por sgrub pa ni //
translated: For that, first, the practitioner🔽Should be devoted to bodhicitta,

original: byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang // gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med //🔽le lo med cing khro ba med //
analyzed: byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang // gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med // le lo med cing khro ba med //
translated: Generous, and not puffed up with learning.🔽He should be diligent and not angry,

original: ser sna med cing g-yo yang med //
analyzed: ser sna med cing g-yo yang med //
translated: Not stingy, and not deceitful.🔽Having abandoned pretense, with clear wisdom,

original: sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang // gcig tu theg pa chen gzhol bas //
analyzed: sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang // gcig tu theg pa chen gzhol bas //
translated: And solely devoted to the Great Vehicle,🔽On the bank of a great river, in the wilderness,

original: chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang // dur khrod shing drung dgon pa dang // dgon pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim //
analyzed: chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang // dur khrod shing drung dgon pa dang // dgon pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim //
translated: In a charnel ground, at the foot of a tree, in a hermitage,🔽In a solitary place, in a mother's house,

original: der ni mgon po'i 'di 'bad la //
analyzed: der ni mgon po'i 'di 'bad la //
translated: There, one should strive in this protector's [practice].

original: gzhan du bsgrubs kyang 'di mi 'grub //
analyzed: gzhan du bsgrubs kyang 'di mi 'grub //
translated: Even if accomplished elsewhere, it will not be accomplished.

original: bde stan la 'dug dang snying gar //
analyzed: bde stan la 'dug dang snying gar //
translated: Sitting on a comfortable seat, in the heart

original: aa las nyi ma de steng h'um //
analyzed: aa las nyi ma de steng h'um //
translated: from a arises a sun, and upon that a hūṃ.

original: de steng 'od 'phros bla ma dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkug bya ste //
analyzed: de steng 'od 'phros bla ma dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkug bya ste //
translated: Light radiates from that, inviting the gurus and perfect buddhas.🔽One should make prostrations, offerings,

original: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang // bshags dang bsngo ba'i bar du bya //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang // bshags dang bsngo ba'i bar du bya //
translated: confessions, and dedications.

original: byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms //
translated: Loving kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity

original: tshad med pa yi rim pa yis //
analyzed: tshad med pa yi rim pa yis //
translated: through the stages of the immeasurables

original: sems can rnams la phan btags te //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan btags te //
translated: benefit sentient beings.

original: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos po rnams //🔽yod min med min gnyis ka min //
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos po rnams // yod min med min gnyis ka min //
translated: The entities of the animate and inanimate🔽are not existent, not nonexistent, not both,

original: gnyis ka med min ba yang min //
analyzed: gnyis ka med min ba yang min //
translated: and also not neither.

original: spros bral ngo bo med pa bsgom //
analyzed: spros bral ngo bo med pa bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the essence free from elaborations.

original: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: śūnyatājñānavajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: rang nyid de ltar gnas pa yis //
analyzed: rang nyid de ltar gnas pa yis //
translated: One’s own nature abides like that.

original: ram las nyi ma bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: ram las nyi ma bsgom bya ste //
translated: From raṃ, meditate on a sun,

original: de steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
analyzed: de steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
translated: and upon that, from hūṃ, a vajra,

original: kun du rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: kun du rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of all is the five summits.🔽

original: de dbus h'um las rdo rje ni //
analyzed: de dbus h'um las rdo rje ni //
translated: In the center of that, from hūṃ, is a vajra

original: kun du 'phros pas bgegs bskrad de //
analyzed: kun du 'phros pas bgegs bskrad de //
translated: that radiates everywhere, expelling obstructors.🔽One should definitely visualize the enclosure and ground

original: rab gur dang sa gzhi dag / de yi 'go tu nges par bsgom //
analyzed: rab gur dang sa gzhi dag / de yi 'go tu nges par bsgom //
translated: at the beginning,

original: sam dang rdo rje rim pa yis //🔽gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni //
analyzed: sam dang rdo rje rim pa yis // gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni //
translated: with the syllable sam and the stage of the vajra.🔽I visualize a white, upward-pointing triangle

original: shin du gsal bar bdag gis dmigs //🔽lam las sa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: shin du gsal bar bdag gis dmigs // lam las sa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: that is very clear.🔽From laṃ, one should imagine the earth maṇḍala

original: ljang ser gru bzhi bsam par bya //
analyzed: ljang ser gru bzhi bsam par bya //
translated: as a yellow square.

original: bam las byung ba chu yin te //
analyzed: bam las byung ba chu yin te //
translated: From vaṃ, there is water,

original: dkar po zlum po bsam bar bya ;
analyzed: dkar po zlum po bsam bar bya ;
translated: which one should imagine as white and round.

original: / ram las byung ba me'i dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: / ram las byung ba me'i dkyil 'khor //
translated: From raṃ, there is the fire maṇḍala,

original: gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya //
analyzed: gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya //
translated: which one should imagine as a red triangle.

original: yam las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: yam las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor //
translated: From yaṃ, there is the air maṇḍala,

original: sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la //
analyzed: sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la //
translated: blue and shaped like a bow,

original: ba dan ldan par nges par bsam //
analyzed: ba dan ldan par nges par bsam //
translated: definitely imagined to have streamers.

original: bh'um byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis //
analyzed: bh'um byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis //
translated: From bhrūṃ, there is a wheel with twelve spokes.

original: lte bar bh'um las gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: lte bar bh'um las gzhal yas khang //
translated: In the center, from bhrūṃ, is a celestial mansion,

original: sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud dang// @70a * //
analyzed: sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud dang// @70a * //
translated: with four doors, archways, and a perimeter wall,

original: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa //
analyzed: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa //
translated: Adorned with nets and half-nets.

original: pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
analyzed: pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
translated: The palace has eight spokes,

original: rdo rje phreng bas rab tu bskor //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas rab tu bskor //
translated: Completely surrounded by a vajra garland.

original: rtsig pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rtsig pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with five walls,

original: padma nyi ma'i gdan ldan bsgom //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gdan ldan bsgom //
translated: And one should meditate on a lotus and sun seat.

original: lte ba'i gdan steng bsam bya ba //
analyzed: lte ba'i gdan steng bsam bya ba //
translated: On the seat in the center one should visualize

original: ka sogs spangs ba'i a'a li ni //
analyzed: ka sogs spangs ba'i a'a li ni //
translated: The a-li syllables, which are devoid of ka and so forth,

original: bcu drug yi ge phrag gnyis te //
analyzed: bcu drug yi ge phrag gnyis te //
translated: Two sets of sixteen syllables,

original: 'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin //
analyzed: 'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin //
translated: Which are the seed syllables of the wheels and so forth.

original: zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis //
translated: Those thirty-two moons

original: aa sogs spangs pa'i k'a li ste //
analyzed: aa sogs spangs pa'i k'a li ste //
translated: Are the ka-li syllables, which are devoid of a and so forth,

original: bcu bdun gnyis po de steng du //
analyzed: bcu bdun gnyis po de steng du //
translated: And above those two sets of seventeen

original: ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid //
analyzed: ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid //
translated: Are the ya and so forth, which are not absent.

original: gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi ba nyid //
analyzed: gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi ba nyid //
translated: The third is threefold, and the fourth

original: bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis //
analyzed: bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis //
translated: Is four times ten, and two sets of that.

original: sen mo zang sogs sa bon te //
analyzed: sen mo zang sogs sa bon te //
translated: The seed syllables of the nails and so forth

original: nyi mar rnams grags de dbus gsum //
analyzed: nyi mar rnams grags de dbus gsum //
translated: Are renowned as the suns, and in their centers

original: h'um dang ya yi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: h'um dang ya yi rang bzhin las //
translated: Are the three natures of hūṃ and ya.

original: rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog / thim pas nan tan ye shes te //
analyzed: rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog / thim pas nan tan ye shes te //
translated: From the dissolution, there is the gnosis of perseverance.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste //
translated: The pure realm of phenomena

original: gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin //
translated: I am the Lord of Death.

original: rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas //
analyzed: rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas //
translated: The various ornaments are on the body.

original: hr'i:zhes brjod pas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: hr'i:zhes brjod pas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: By saying “HRIH,” the Bhagavat

original: rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la ;🔽/ bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni //
analyzed: rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la ; / bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni //
translated: is in the center of the eight-spoked wheel.

original: drug drug ldan par gyur par bsgom //
analyzed: drug drug ldan par gyur par bsgom //
translated: I visualize myself with six faces and six arms.

original: zhabs kyang de dag 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: zhabs kyang de dag 'dra ba ste //
translated: The feet are also like that.

original: g-yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni //
analyzed: g-yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni //
translated: In the first right hand

original: rdo rje tho ba g-yas pa gnyis //🔽ral gri de bzhin g-yon gnyis kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje tho ba g-yas pa gnyis // ral gri de bzhin g-yon gnyis kyang //
translated: is a vajra hammer. In the second right

original: dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan //
analyzed: dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan //
translated: is a sword. In the first left🔽is a noose. In the second left

original: gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin //
analyzed: gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin //
translated: is a club.

original: rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams //
translated: In the last right hand is a vajra bell.

original: steng zhal nag po rab tu 'jigs //
analyzed: steng zhal nag po rab tu 'jigs //
translated: The upper face is black and very frightening.

original: zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste //
translated: The two feet are in vajra posture,

original: brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas //🔽stag lpags kyis ni smad dkris shing //
analyzed: brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas // stag lpags kyis ni smad dkris shing //
translated: standing on four feet with outstretched legs.🔽The lower body is wrapped in a tiger skin,

original: sim has se ral ral pa ni //
analyzed: sim has se ral ral pa ni //
translated: and the hair is bound up with a lion.

original: gyen bsgreng bsdus te spyi bor yang //
analyzed: gyen bsgreng bsdus te spyi bor yang //
translated: It is gathered up and on the crown of the head🔽is a topknot.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings //
translated: And is bound by a garland of skulls.

original: 'od dang khro bo 'chol ba ste //
analyzed: 'od dang khro bo 'chol ba ste //
translated: He is blazing, wrathful, and terrifying,

original: lag cha sna tshogs mtshan dang ldan //
analyzed: lag cha sna tshogs mtshan dang ldan //
translated: And has various weapons and signs.

original: zhal bzhad hr'i:shtri:'i sgar sgrogs shing //
analyzed: zhal bzhad hr'i:shtri:'i sgar sgrogs shing //
translated: He laughs with a hrih and shatri,

original: ro langs ma la rab tu 'khyud //
analyzed: ro langs ma la rab tu 'khyud //
translated: And embraces the zombie woman.

original: ma he gshin rje khyo shug mnan //🔽lag ngar gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
analyzed: ma he gshin rje khyo shug mnan // lag ngar gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
translated: He tramples on the buffalo and Yama, husband and wife.🔽With the two forearms crossed,

original: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te //
analyzed: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te //
translated: The two index fingers are in the shape of hooks.

original: se gol brdab cing bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: se gol brdab cing bsdu bar bya //
translated: Snap the fingers and summon.🔽Om vajra samaja ja

original: aom badzra sa m'a dza:dza:mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul bar bya //🔽aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra sa m'a dza:dza:mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul bar bya // aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Offer water for the feet.🔽Om argham pratishta svaha

original: pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Pravara satkara pratishta svaha

original: lcags kyu la sogs rnam bzhi yis //
analyzed: lcags kyu la sogs rnam bzhi yis //
translated: With the four, such as the hook,

original: nges par dgug pa la sogs bya //
analyzed: nges par dgug pa la sogs bya //
translated: Definitely summon and so forth.🔽Om vajra amku sha ja

original: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:aom badzra p'a sha h'um /🔽aom badzra spo ta bam /
analyzed: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:aom badzra p'a sha h'um / aom badzra spo ta bam /
translated: Om vajra pasha hum🔽Om vajra sphota bam

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:/
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:/
translated: Om vajra ave sha ho

original: lcags @70b kyu kha dog dkar po la //
analyzed: lcags @70b kyu kha dog dkar po la //
translated: The hook is white in color.

original: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas brkyang bzhugs //
analyzed: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas brkyang bzhugs //
translated: His left hand rests on his hip, and his right leg is extended.

original: g-yas kyis lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //🔽zhags pa kha dog sngon po la //
analyzed: g-yas kyis lcags kyu bsnams pa'o // zhags pa kha dog sngon po la //
translated: He holds a goad in his right hand.🔽The blue noose

original: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas zhags pa //
analyzed: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas zhags pa //
translated: rests in his left hand on his hip, and his right hand holds a noose.

original: g-yon brkyang stabs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang stabs su gnas pa'o //
translated: He stands in the extended-left posture.

original: lcags sgrog kha dog dmar po la //
analyzed: lcags sgrog kha dog dmar po la //
translated: The red iron chain

original: phyag gnyis kyis ni lcags sgrog bsnams //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis ni lcags sgrog bsnams //
translated: is held in both hands.

original: sa ga'i stabs su bzhugs pa'o //🔽dril bu kha dog ljang gu la //
analyzed: sa ga'i stabs su bzhugs pa'o // dril bu kha dog ljang gu la //
translated: He stands in the half-dance posture.🔽The green bell

original: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas dril bu //
analyzed: phyag g-yon dkur brten g-yas dril bu //
translated: rests in his left hand on his hip, and his right hand holds a bell.

original: zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyis ni bzhugs //
analyzed: zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyis ni bzhugs //
translated: He sits in the cross-legged posture.

original: khro bo sgeg pa'i cha lugs 'dzin //
analyzed: khro bo sgeg pa'i cha lugs 'dzin //
translated: He has a wrathful and playful demeanor.

original: rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: shar sgo la sogs rim bzhin gnas //
analyzed: shar sgo la sogs rim bzhin gnas //
translated: He resides in the eastern gate, and so forth, in order.

original: lce steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
analyzed: lce steng h'um las rdo rje ni //
translated: On the tongue, from hūṃ, is a vajra.

original: gnod mdzes nag po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gnod mdzes nag po bsgom par bya //
translated: Meditate on black Sumbha.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i //
translated: Vajrasattva and so forth

original: phyag rgyas dbang bskur rigs lngas brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgyas dbang bskur rigs lngas brgyan //
translated: are the five families who confer empowerment with their mudras.

original: rdo rje bcings nas gung mo bsgreng //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings nas gung mo bsgreng //
translated: The vajra-binding mudra with the index fingers extended

original: myu gu ltar byas sems ma'i rgya //
analyzed: myu gu ltar byas sems ma'i rgya //
translated: The mudrā of the mind mother is like a sprout.

original: spyi bor gzhag pa sngags brjod pas //🔽spyi bor rdo rje sems dpas mtshan//
analyzed: spyi bor gzhag pa sngags brjod pas // spyi bor rdo rje sems dpas mtshan//
translated: Placing it on the head and reciting the mantra,🔽the head is marked with Vajrasattva.

original: mthe bong sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung //
analyzed: mthe bong sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung //
translated: The heart center of the thumb is the mind hero.

original: mdzub mo gung mo rtse sbyar te //
analyzed: mdzub mo gung mo rtse sbyar te //
translated: The index and middle fingers are joined at the tips.

original: mdzu ba mo'i gung mo'i tshigs gnyis la //
analyzed: mdzu ba mo'i gung mo'i tshigs gnyis la //
translated: The two joints of the index and middle fingers

original: yid tsam bcag la lhag par sbyar //🔽rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya ste //🔽dpral gzhag rnam snang gis ni mtshan //
analyzed: yid tsam bcag la lhag par sbyar // rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya ste // dpral gzhag rnam snang gis ni mtshan //
translated: are slightly bent and joined together.🔽This is the mudrā of Vairocana.🔽Placing it on the forehead, it is marked with Vairocana.

original: gung mo rin chen gzugs ltar bya //
analyzed: gung mo rin chen gzugs ltar bya //
translated: The middle fingers are shaped like a jewel.

original: rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya ste //
analyzed: rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya ste //
translated: This is the mudrā of the jewel family.

original: rna g-yas steng gzhag rin chen mtshan //
analyzed: rna g-yas steng gzhag rin chen mtshan //
translated: Placing it above the right ear, it is marked with a jewel.

original: sor mo padma'i myu gu ltar //🔽byas la gung gnyis rtse sprad de //
analyzed: sor mo padma'i myu gu ltar // byas la gung gnyis rtse sprad de //
translated: The fingers are like lotus shoots,🔽the two middle fingers are joined at the tips,

original: yid tsam thur du gzhag byas la //
analyzed: yid tsam thur du gzhag byas la //
translated: and slightly bent downward.

original: chos kyi rdo rje ma yi rgya //
analyzed: chos kyi rdo rje ma yi rgya //
translated: This is the mudrā of Dharmavajra.

original: ltag par bzhag pas snang mtha' byas //
analyzed: ltag par bzhag pas snang mtha' byas //
translated: Placing it on the nape of the neck, it is marked with Amitābha.

original: rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las //
translated: From the vajra-folded palms,

original: mthe bong gnyis ni mnyam por sbyar //
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis ni mnyam por sbyar //
translated: the two thumbs are joined together.

original: gung mo'i tshigs ni gsum pa yi //
analyzed: gung mo'i tshigs ni gsum pa yi //
translated: The middle joint of the middle finger

original: rgyab tu mdzub mo'i rtse bzhag la //
analyzed: rgyab tu mdzub mo'i rtse bzhag la //
translated: is placed on the tip of the index finger.

original: las kyi rdo rje ma yi rgya //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje ma yi rgya //
translated: This is the seal of Karmavajra.

original: rna g-yon steng gzhag don yod grub //
analyzed: rna g-yon steng gzhag don yod grub //
translated: Place it above the right ear for Amoghasiddhi.

original: aom dzi na dzi ka /🔽aom ratna dhrika /
analyzed: aom dzi na dzi ka / aom ratna dhrika /
translated: Om jinamuki.🔽Om ratnadhrik.

original: aom a'a ro lika /
analyzed: aom a'a ro lika /
translated: Om arolik.

original: aom pradzny'a dhrika /
analyzed: aom pradzny'a dhrika /
translated: Om prajnadrik.

original: shar rtsibs la sogs rnams bzhi la //
analyzed: shar rtsibs la sogs rnams bzhi la //
translated: On the four spokes beginning with the east,

original: gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang //
analyzed: gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang //
translated: the four beginning with delusion

original: dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // de bzhin bzhi ba ljang gu ste //
analyzed: dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // de bzhin bzhi ba ljang gu ste //
translated: are white, yellow, red, and likewise green in the fourth.

original: g-yas kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'bar //
analyzed: g-yas kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'bar //
translated: The right hand has a blazing wheel and jewel,

original: padma sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
analyzed: padma sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
translated: a lotus and a crossed vajra.

original: g-yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin //
translated: The left holds a bell well.

original: mig sogs byin gyis brlabs byas la //
analyzed: mig sogs byin gyis brlabs byas la //
translated: Having consecrated the eyes and so forth,

original: gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis bsrung //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis bsrung //
translated: protect with Mohavajra and so forth.

original: dbang sbub stong pa nyid bya ste //🔽snying po 'am ming gi yi ge yis //🔽@71a * // rigs kyi phyag rgya ldan pa yi //
analyzed: dbang sbub stong pa nyid bya ste // snying po 'am ming gi yi ge yis // @71a * // rigs kyi phyag rgya ldan pa yi //
translated: Make the consecration of the body into emptiness,🔽and the forms are definitely generated by the essence or the seed syllable

original: sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so //
analyzed: sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so //
translated: endowed with the family seal.

original: lkog ma dpral ba snying ga ru //
analyzed: lkog ma dpral ba snying ga ru //
translated: At the throat, forehead, and heart,

original: sku gsung thugs su bskyed pa las //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su bskyed pa las //
translated: From the generation of body, speech, and mind,🔽the deities of body, speech, and mind

original: sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dag / rang lus bcug ste gnas pa las //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dag / rang lus bcug ste gnas pa las //
translated: are purified and dwell in one’s body.

original: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni //
analyzed: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni //
translated: The consecration by mantra is as follows:

original: aom sarba ta th'a g'a ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /🔽aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a g'a ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata kāya vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.🔽Oṃ sarva tathāgata vāca vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom badzra ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom badzra ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ vajra tathāgata citta vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: snying gar rang 'dra'i ye shes sems //
analyzed: snying gar rang 'dra'i ye shes sems //
translated: In the heart is the gnosis being similar to oneself,

original: de yi thugs kar rdo rje la //
analyzed: de yi thugs kar rdo rje la //
translated: in the heart of that is a vajra

original: h'um gis mtshan pa'i yi ges bskor //
analyzed: h'um gis mtshan pa'i yi ges bskor //
translated: surrounded by the syllable hūṃ.

original: lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te //
analyzed: lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te //
translated: The two hands are joined in añjali,

original: gung mo'i rtse mo'i tshigs gnyis la //🔽mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: gung mo'i rtse mo'i tshigs gnyis la // mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya //
translated: the tips of the two middle fingers🔽are joined by the two thumbs,

original: mdzub mo rgyab rtser sbyar ba ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo rgyab rtser sbyar ba ni //
translated: and the two index fingers touch at the tips.

original: 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
translated: This is the samaya mudra.

original: snying ga dpral ba lkog ma dang // dpral ba byin gyis brlab par bya //
analyzed: snying ga dpral ba lkog ma dang // dpral ba byin gyis brlab par bya //
translated: The heart, the forehead, the throat, and the forehead are consecrated.🔽Om hrishta vikritanan hum hum phat phat.

original: aom hr'ishtri: wi kri t'a nan h'um h'um phat phat /🔽aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am /
analyzed: aom hr'ishtri: wi kri t'a nan h'um h'um phat phat / aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am /
translated: Adhisthana svam.

original: lo tsa na h'um /
analyzed: lo tsa na h'um /
translated: Locana hum.

original: m'a ma k'i tram /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i tram /
translated: Mamaki tram.

original: panda ra hr'i /🔽t'ar aa / mtshams su lam sogs las skyes pa //
analyzed: panda ra hr'i / t'ar aa / mtshams su lam sogs las skyes pa //
translated: Pandara hrīḥ.🔽Tara āḥ.

original: lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam //
translated: In the intermediate directions, one should visualize the four goddesses born from lam and so forth.

original: bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin //
analyzed: bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin //
translated: They are like the lord, and they hold the grace of beauty.

original: me mtshams sgeg mo dkar mo ni //
analyzed: me mtshams sgeg mo dkar mo ni //
translated: In the southeast, the white Lady of Beauty

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung brkyang bas bzhugs //
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung brkyang bas bzhugs //
translated: sits in the posture of a bodhisattva.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dkur brten //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dkur brten //
translated: She rests her two vajra fists on her hips,

original: g-yon du yud tsam 'dud pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon du yud tsam 'dud pa'o //
translated: and she bows slightly to the left.

original: bden bral mtshams su kha dogs ser //
analyzed: bden bral mtshams su kha dogs ser //
translated: In the southwest, she is yellow,

original: yon tan brgyus ma phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: yon tan brgyus ma phyag na bsnams //
translated: holding a garland of jewels in her hand.

original: rlung gi phyogs su mdog dkar mo //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su mdog dkar mo //
translated: In the northwest, she is white,

original: glu len pi wang sgreng par byed //
analyzed: glu len pi wang sgreng par byed //
translated: singing and holding a lute.

original: dbang ldan mtshams su kha dog ljang //🔽phyag gnyis phyogs su gar bsgyur ba //
analyzed: dbang ldan mtshams su kha dog ljang // phyag gnyis phyogs su gar bsgyur ba //
translated: In the northeast, she is green,🔽dancing with her two hands.

original: grva ru brtsegs ma dh'u ppe ni //
analyzed: grva ru brtsegs ma dh'u ppe ni //
translated: In the corners, the stacked up Dhūpā

original: g-yon du yud tsam 'dud pa la //
analyzed: g-yon du yud tsam 'dud pa la //
translated: On the left, slightly bending,

original: pushpe gar byed kha dog ljang ;
analyzed: pushpe gar byed kha dog ljang ;
translated: Puṣpī, green, dancing,

original: / d'i pe kha dog dmar mo la //
analyzed: / d'i pe kha dog dmar mo la //
translated: Dīpī, red,

original: lag gnyis gyen bsgreng mar me dbul //
analyzed: lag gnyis gyen bsgreng mar me dbul //
translated: with two hands raised, offering a lamp.

original: gandhe kha dog ljang gu la //
analyzed: gandhe kha dog ljang gu la //
translated: Gandhī, green,

original: lag gnyis dri ni byug par byed //
analyzed: lag gnyis dri ni byug par byed //
translated: with two hands applying perfume.

original: phyag rgya sngags rnams brjod pas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya sngags rnams brjod pas so //
translated: By reciting the mantras and mudrās.🔽The fists are placed on the hips,🔽then on the forehead,

original: khu tshur dku gnyis gzhag pa dang // de bzhin dpral bar myug pa dang // kha nas 'byung dang gar byed bskyed //
analyzed: khu tshur dku gnyis gzhag pa dang // de bzhin dpral bar myug pa dang // kha nas 'byung dang gar byed bskyed //
translated: emerging from the mouth, and dancing.

original: bdug spos myug dang me tog 'thor //
analyzed: bdug spos myug dang me tog 'thor //
translated: Incense is offered, flowers scattered,

original: mthe bong brkyang ste rang lus la'am //
analyzed: mthe bong brkyang ste rang lus la'am //
translated: the thumb extended to one’s own body

original: gzhan la myug tshul gnas pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan la myug tshul gnas pa ni //
translated: or to another, as if offering.🔽These eight are the mudrās

original: brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag / bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin //
analyzed: brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag / bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin //
translated: of the offering goddesses, generated and well-placed.

original: l'a s+ya ma le g'i rti ni rti /🔽aom badzra dh'u ppe /
analyzed: l'a s+ya ma le g'i rti ni rti / aom badzra dh'u ppe /
translated: Lāsyā, Mālyā, Gītikā, Nṛtyā,🔽Oṃ vajra dhūpā,

original: aom badzra pushpe /
analyzed: aom badzra pushpe /
translated: Oṃ vajra puṣpā,

original: aom badzra a'a lo ke / aom badzra gendhe /
analyzed: aom badzra a'a lo ke / aom badzra gendhe /
translated: Oṃ vajra āloke, Oṃ vajra gandhe.

original: bstod @71b pa rnams kyis yongs su bstod //
analyzed: bstod @71b pa rnams kyis yongs su bstod //
translated: They are praised with the praises.

original: bdud rtsi ji bzhin byin brlabs la //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ji bzhin byin brlabs la //
translated: Consecrate it as if it were nectar.

original: lce rlabs dbus kyis myang bar bya //
analyzed: lce rlabs dbus kyis myang bar bya //
translated: One should taste it with the middle tongue.

original: rang rang sngags rnams brjod pas so //
analyzed: rang rang sngags rnams brjod pas so //
translated: One should recite one's own mantra.

original: bdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni //
analyzed: bdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni //
translated: The letter of fear of the incense

original: bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa las //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa las //
translated: is visualized in the fourteenth.

original: 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba la'ang //
analyzed: 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba la'ang //
translated: One should visualize it in cyclic existence,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil na dmigs pa ltar ;
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil na dmigs pa ltar ;
translated: as if visualizing it in the orb of the sun.

original: / dmigs te ma yengs 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: / dmigs te ma yengs 'jigs pa med //
translated: Visualize it without distraction, without fear.

original: bzlas pa nyid la de ltar bya //
analyzed: bzlas pa nyid la de ltar bya //
translated: One should do it in the recitation itself.

original: bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis //🔽rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa //
analyzed: bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis // rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa //
translated: By reciting the full ten million times,🔽there is nothing that is not accomplished

original: med de thams cad de yis 'grub //
analyzed: med de thams cad de yis 'grub //
translated: in the infinite activities; all are accomplished by that.

original: 'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang //
analyzed: 'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang //
translated: By reciting one hundred thousand or one million times,

original: phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed //
analyzed: phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed //
translated: one will accomplish the subtle activities.🔽One should recite in that way

original: gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyis ni //🔽de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyis ni // de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya //
translated: with a mind that does not go elsewhere.

original: yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis //
analyzed: yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis //
translated: The mind that goes to another object

original: bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin //
analyzed: bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin //
translated: will not produce results even if one recites for an eon.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'byung po rnams dang bcu bzhi pa //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams dang bcu bzhi pa //
translated: and the bhūtas on the fourteenth.

original: spel bas gtor ma spyin par bya //
analyzed: spel bas gtor ma spyin par bya //
translated: One should give the bali with the increase.

original: hi hi hi h'um /
analyzed: hi hi hi h'um /
translated: Hi hi hi hūṃ.

original: phem phem phem sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phem phem phem sv'a h'a /
translated: Phaṃ phaṃ phaṃ svāhā.

original: 'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te //
translated: Thinking of going for the sake of the world,

original: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya //
analyzed: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya //
translated: one should make offerings, praise, and taste the elixir.

original: de nyid gsum mthar mu: ldan pas //
analyzed: de nyid gsum mthar mu: ldan pas //
translated: At the end of the three realities, with muḥ,

original: rang bzhin gshegs shing bskyed pa bsdu //🔽bzod par gsol dang gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: rang bzhin gshegs shing bskyed pa bsdu // bzod par gsol dang gsol ba gdab //
translated: the natural and generated [deities] are dissolved.🔽One should request forbearance, make requests,

original: bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya //
analyzed: bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya //
translated: dedicate, and make aspirations.

original: gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid //
translated: Moreover, one should meditate

original: gang gang dbang po'i lam 'gro ba //
analyzed: gang gang dbang po'i lam 'gro ba //
translated: on whatever appears on the path of the senses.

original: de yi ngo bor bdag gis blta //
analyzed: de yi ngo bor bdag gis blta //
translated: One should view it as the essence of that.

original: bsam gtan mi byed de blo yi //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed de blo yi //
translated: One should not meditate with the mind,

original: kun du blo yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: kun du blo yis bsgom par bya //
translated: but meditate with the mind everywhere.🔽One should strive in rising, lying down, external bathing,

original: ldang dang nyal dang phyi khrus dang // bza' ba dag la brtson par bya //
analyzed: ldang dang nyal dang phyi khrus dang // bza' ba dag la brtson par bya //
translated: and eating.

original: bcas dang bral ba med mod kyang //
analyzed: bcas dang bral ba med mod kyang //
translated: Although there is no separation from the precepts,

original: bdag dang blo dman don du bsdus //
analyzed: bdag dang blo dman don du bsdus //
translated: I have compiled this for the sake of myself and those of lesser intellect.

original: 'di yi dge bas 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: 'di yi dge bas 'gro ba rnams //
translated: By this virtue, may all beings

original: bcings pa rnams las grol bar shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus la /
analyzed: bcings pa rnams las grol bar shog / dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus la /
translated: This is the concise sādhana of the wheel of glorious black Yamāri with six faces.

original: slo dpon de ba a'a ka ra tsandras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slo dpon de ba a'a ka ra tsandras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It was composed by Ācārya Deva Ākāśagarbha.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra tsandra de nyid dang / cog ro bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra tsandra de nyid dang / cog ro bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Deva Ākāśagarbha and the Tibetan editor Chokro Lui Gyaltsen.
